title: Gaurav Dutt Meda
text:
About Me
A current MBA student with 2.3 years of experience as an HR Analyst, actively seeking entry-level HR and recruiting positions. With a robust foundation in HR analytics and data management, I am keen to expand my understanding of organizational culture and market dynamics. My analytical skills and ongoing academic pursuits enable me to contribute to HR functions effectively. Dedicated to continuous professional development, I am eager to gain insights into various HR aspects and significantly contribute to the industry.
